name: Cats 2020
description:
This game was themed around the 2019 movie Cats. It's an experimental rhythm game where you must get the Jellicle cats to come to you by singing their song. Made with Alisa Chen.

Instructions:  Press ASD to sing at different pitches. Match the pitch and timing to get the cat to come to you. Press tab for a special surprise, and space to start the game.
